framework:install.description: Install the documentation framework inside a repo

branch.name: branch
branch.description: The framework branch that should be checked out

destination.name: destination
destination.description: The path where the framework should be installed

framework:link.description: Links a local version of the docs to the installed framework

deploy_path.name: deploy_path
deploy_path.description: The path where the local version of the docs will be deployed (e.g. /sdk/js/6/) - env: $DEPLOY_PATH

doc_version.name: doc_version
doc_version.description: The local version of the docs to be linked, relative to the base doc root (e.g. 6/) - env: $DOC_VERSION

base_root.name: base_root
base_root.description: The local root of the docs

framework:local-deploy.description: Creates a local deployment of the docs

repositories.name: repositories
repositories.description: The list of repositories to deploy - env: $REPOSITORIES

destination.name: destination
destination.description: The destination path to deploy to - env: $DESTINATION

branch.name: branch
branch.description: The branch type to checkout - env: $BRANCH

repositories.name: repositories
repositories.description: The list of repositories to build - env: $REPOSITORIES

repos_path.name: repos_path
repos_path.description: The path where the repositories are installed - env: $REPOS_PATH

iterate-repos:cloudfront.description: Invalidates the Cloudfront cache of a list of repositories

repositories.name: repositories
repositories.description: The list of repositories to deploy - env: $REPOSITORIES

repos_path.name: repos_path
repos_path.description: The path where the repositories are installed - env: $REPOS_PATH

cloudfront_distribution_id.name: cloudfront_distribution_id
cloudfront_distribution_id.description: The Cloudfront distribution ID where the invalidation will be created - env: $CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID

iterate-repos:deploy.description: Deploy a list of sub-repositories (or all) to an S3 bucket

repositories.name: repositories
repositories.description: The list of repositories to deploy - env: $REPOSITORIES

repos_path.name: repos_path
repos_path.description: The path where the repositories are installed - env: $REPOS_PATH

s3_bucket.name: s3_bucket
s3_bucket.description: The ID of the S3 bucket to deploy the docs to

iterate-repos:execute.description:
execute a command or shell script upon a set of repos (missing repos will not be installed)

EXAMPLES

$ kuzdoc iterate-repos:execute "echo I haz never been here > iwazhere"

Executes two inline commands upon the list of repos.

$ kuzdoc iterate-repos:execute /tmp/my-test-script

Executes a shell script upon the list of repos

repositories.description: The list of repositories to build - env: $REPOSITORIES

repos_path.name: repos_path
repos_path.description: The path where the repositories are installed - env: $REPOS_PATH

args.name: command
args.description: the command or script to execute

iterate-repos:install.description: Install a list of sub-repositories (or all) to a given destination

link_framework.description: Whether to link the doc framework to the repositories or not
